description:
After rescuing Jeanne, Shinobu acknowledges her ideals and invites her to join the Seven Light Faith. Meanwhile, Tanganika, the precious mage of Imperial General Neuro, unveils his hidden power, laying death and destruction to his surroundings in an ample display of the empire`s might. To counter him, the world`s greatest politician, Mikogami Tsukasa, executes his prearranged plan lighting the beacon of revolution in this other world.
"We will defeat the empire and carry out our revolution." Tsukasa then speaks on the new world, the new nation they`ll create before the crowd gathered around him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choujin Koukousei-tachi wa Isekai demo Yoyuu de Ikinuku You Desu!
It Seems High School Prodigies Have It Easy Even in Another World!
Les Super Lycéens survivent aisément dans un autre monde !
يبدو أن عباقرة المدرسة الثانوية لا يواجهون صعوبة حتى في عالم آخر!
超人高校生たちは異世界でも余裕で生き抜くようです!
